references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), a key technology leveraged by Diffusion-4K for high-resolution image synthesis.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This reference introduces the rectified flow transformer architecture, an essential component for large-scale diffusion models used in Diffusion-4K.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: LAION-5B provides a large-scale dataset crucial for training image-text models, which Diffusion-4K also relies on.
This paper presents Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models which serve as a foundation for diffusion models implemented in Diffusion-4K.
This paper shows how to implement the GPT-4o system to generate captions for images which are used in Diffusion-4K.
